name: Abattoir
description: A slaughterhouse where livestock is processed; adventurers might find evidence of foul play, secure rare animal parts, or encounter desperate workers.
atmosphere: The air is thick with the metallic scent of blood and the sound of sharpening knives. The building echoes with the cries of animals and the thud of heavy cleavers. Workers with blood-stained aprons move methodically through their grim tasks, while the floor is slick with the evidence of their work.
